title: Development Process of an Educational Software Evaluation Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented project execution using simulation/VR tools in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Systematically develop educational software evaluation criteria based on theoretical foundations
Evaluate the qualitative level of science simulation/VR software through multidimensional criteria (educational value, functionality, usability)
Based on evaluation results, practitioners can propose software improvement directions from a practical perspective

resources: Educational Software Samples for Science Subjects

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
